pageTitle: Temporary changes to bus stopping arrangements at Waltham Cross bus station

title.title: Temporary changes to bus stopping arrangements at Waltham Cross bus station

texts: From Monday 23 May several bus services will not be calling at Waltham Cross bus station while essential resurfacing and drainage works are undertaken.
Construction will take place Monday to Friday between 8:00 and 18:00 and will last for approximately four weeks.
Ongoing works mean the bus station will not be served by routes 217, 279, 317, 327, 491 and N279.
The next nearest bus stop is on the High Street.
Non-London buses routes 211, 212, 213, 240, 242, 250, 251, 255, 310, 310A, 311, C2, C3 and C4 will continue to serve the bus station using stop A and B only.
Details of stopping arrangements during the works will be available at local bus stops, around the bus station and on the Transport for London website at tfl.gov.uk .
Bus station staff will also be available to advise passengers.
